original: @268b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @268b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s+y'a shta pa da sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s+y'a shta pa da sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Shri Mahakalasyashtapadastotra-nama

original: bod skad du /üîΩdpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bod skad du / dpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩThe Praise of Glorious Mahakalashtapadastotra

original: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Mahakalashtapadastotra

original: aom grub par gyur cig / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gsum gyi khongs ni ma lus 'gengs nus pa'i //
analyzed: aom grub par gyur cig / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gsum gyi khongs ni ma lus 'gengs nus pa'i //
translated: Om, may it be accomplished! Hum hum phat! With fierce sounds filling the entire three realms,

original: ha ha ta ta zhes brjod gang zhig dus kun du ni bdud sde shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing //
analyzed: ha ha ta ta zhes brjod gang zhig dus kun du ni bdud sde shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing //
translated: Ha ha ta ta! The one who always frightens the hosts of Mara,

original: kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la sbras shing nag po'i mchu dang mtshungs pa'i sku //
analyzed: kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la sbras shing nag po'i mchu dang mtshungs pa'i sku //
translated: Kam kam kam! With a skull garland adorning the head, a body resembling a black bird,

original: brum brum brum zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khro gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa kha gdangs sha za zhing //
analyzed: brum brum brum zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khro gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa kha gdangs sha za zhing //
translated: Bhrum bhrum bhrum! The one with angry frowns, terrifying, gaping mouth, and flesh-eating,

original: dbu skra dang ni sma ra ches ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
analyzed: dbu skra dang ni sma ra ches ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
translated: With hair and beard very yellow, you protect the field of enjoyment.

original: ram ram ram zhes spyan dmar 'khyug cing bsgyur mdzad krum krum krum zhes rab sgrogs spyan gyis gzigs //
analyzed: ram ram ram zhes spyan dmar 'khyug cing bsgyur mdzad krum krum krum zhes rab sgrogs spyan gyis gzigs //
translated: RAM RAM RAM, with eyes red and darting, you move about, KRUM KRUM KRUM, looking with eyes that proclaim.

original: smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod //
analyzed: smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod //
translated: With eyebrows yellow, fangs bared, on a seat of corpses, you, the protector of the field, protect the field.

original: ha ha h'um dang k'i li k'i li zhes sgrogs phyag g-yon kha tv'am gar bcas thod pa bsnams //
analyzed: ha ha h'um dang k'i li k'i li zhes sgrogs phyag g-yon kha tv'am gar bcas thod pa bsnams //
translated: HA HA HUM, with the sound of KAH LI KAH LI, your left hand holds a skull-cup with a katvanga,

original: ru ru ru zhes khrag gi rgyun 'bab phyag gis bsnams shing gsol ba 'thung ba la dgyes shing //
analyzed: ru ru ru zhes khrag gi rgyun 'bab phyag gis bsnams shing gsol ba 'thung ba la dgyes shing //
translated: RU RU RU, with a stream of blood flowing, you hold it in your hand and drink, delighting in drinking.

original: kham kham kham zhes gtum mo'i phyag g-yas gri gug ral gri bgegs rnams la ni rol mdzad pas //
analyzed: kham kham kham zhes gtum mo'i phyag g-yas gri gug ral gri bgegs rnams la ni rol mdzad pas //
translated: KHAM KHAM KHAM, with a flaying knife and sword in your right hand, you revel in the obstructors.

original: dam dam dam zhes da ma ru can 'di yis 'dul mdzad 'khor bcas zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
analyzed: dam dam dam zhes da ma ru can 'di yis 'dul mdzad 'khor bcas zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
translated: DAM DAM DAM, with a damaru, you tame them. You, the protector of the field, together with your retinue, protect.

original: rab tu rngam zhing mgo bo rnams kyi phreng bas gshin rje dang mtshungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing //
analyzed: rab tu rngam zhing mgo bo rnams kyi phreng bas gshin rje dang mtshungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing //
translated: Very wrathful, with a garland of heads, you are adorned with a body terrifying like Yama.

original: ksham ksham ksham zhes bzod pa'i shugs can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste //
analyzed: ksham ksham ksham zhes bzod pa'i shugs can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste //
translated: The powerful one, who is endowed with patience, roars k·π£a·πÉ k·π£a·πÉ k·π£a·πÉ, and he holds the demons.

original: gcig pus sna tshogs mnan nas ka ka ha ha brjod mdzad char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdog / sku la mi yi sha dang rgyu mas brel pa'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan cing zhal du gsol //
analyzed: gcig pus sna tshogs mnan nas ka ka ha ha brjod mdzad char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdog / sku la mi yi sha dang rgyu mas brel pa'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan cing zhal du gsol //
translated: He, who is alone, presses down on the various [demons] and says kaka ha ha, and he is the color of a blue rain cloud. He is completely adorned with ornaments of human flesh and intestines, and he eats [them].

original: drag shul phyag gis 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can gyi ni 'byung po ro langs tshogs //
analyzed: drag shul phyag gis 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can gyi ni 'byung po ro langs tshogs //
translated: With his wrathful hand, he holds the entire assembly of bh≈´tas and vetƒÅlas, who have the forms of desire and ugliness.

original: ma lus bzung nas myur du bsad pa rnams kyi mgo bo'i khrag rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gsol //
analyzed: ma lus bzung nas myur du bsad pa rnams kyi mgo bo'i khrag rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gsol //
translated: He quickly kills them and drinks the flowing blood from their heads.

original: hr'im kshui shr'i zhes sngags kyi gsungs can pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags kyis bgegs rnams rab tu bsregs //üîΩrol pas @269a * //

original: rol pa sel zhing mi yis gang ba'i mtsho la zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrung ba mdzad //
analyzed: rol pa sel zhing mi yis gang ba'i mtsho la zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrung ba mdzad //
translated: He, who is the protector of the ocean filled with humans, removes the play [of the demons] and protects the field.

original: phem phem phat ces sgrogs pa so sor bskyod pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus su bzhugs nas su //

original: bam bam bam zhes gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
analyzed: bam bam bam zhes gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
translated: He is like the sun, which is the cause of the destruction of the sins and obstacles of the cattle every day.

original: yam yam yam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten gnod byed mkhyen //
analyzed: yam yam yam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten gnod byed mkhyen //
translated: Yam yam yam, the speed of the wind, quickly moving, knowing the afflictions, the world, the harm-doers.

original: klim klim klim zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
analyzed: klim klim klim zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
translated: Klim klim klim, with a wrathful form, the three existences, day and night, always afflicted.

original: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong la //
analyzed: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong la //
translated: Pam pam pam, with a noose of compassion, the animals are held, with a hand, the disciples are protected.

original: sngags bdag sngags kyi lus can thugs kyi sngags pa rnams la 'bras bu blo gros mtshungs med ster //
analyzed: sngags bdag sngags kyi lus can thugs kyi sngags pa rnams la 'bras bu blo gros mtshungs med ster //
translated: The lord of mantras, having a mantra body, the mantra in the mind, bestows the result, unequaled intelligence.

original: zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring skyong du gsol //
analyzed: zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring skyong du gsol //
translated: You, the protector of the fields, please protect for a long time all the bodies of beings.

original: sgrub pa po'am slob dpon 'ga' zhig thos 'dzin gang zhig blo ldan nus pa dang // thun gsum du ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang // tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor ba 'dzin dang gzi rgyas pa dang mtshungs med dang //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'am slob dpon 'ga' zhig thos 'dzin gang zhig blo ldan nus pa dang // thun gsum du ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang // tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor ba 'dzin dang gzi rgyas pa dang mtshungs med dang //
translated: will have merit, and will hold life, glory, fame, wealth, splendor, and matchlessness.

original: sa stengs dang na mtho ris su'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa stengs dang na mtho ris su'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur //
translated: On the earth and in the heavens, his hosts of obstacles will always be destroyed.

original: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba //
translated: The Praise to Glorious MahƒÅkƒÅla in Eight LinesüîΩis finished.

original: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: By the master ƒÄrya NƒÅgƒÅrjuna.
